段: Ti7一個細細e5田庄，阮已經經過兩年lah。Ti7 chu7年e5這e5時陣，tu2-tu2 復活節了e5 時，阮兩人hou7阿姨chhoa7來chia，受伊e5 照顧，ka7阿姨鬥做工，經過濟濟心悶  e5 日子。今阮有較大漢lah。

Ti7 chit8 e5 se3-se3 e5 chhan5-chng, goan2 i2-keng keng-koe3 nng7 ni5 lah.  Ti7 chu7-ni5 e5 chit e5 si5-chun7, tu2-tu2 Koh-oah8-cheh liau2 e5 si5, goan2 nng7 lang5 hou7 a-i5 chhoa7 lai5 chia, siu7 i e5 chiau3-kou3, ka7 a-i5 tau3 cho3 kang, keng-koe3 che7-che7 sim-bun7 e5 jit8-chi2.  TaN goan2 u7 khah toa7-han3 lah.

會記得阿母beh離開世間e5 時，叫阮來眠床前，牽阮e5 手，用m7 bat聽見e5 憂悶e5 聲對阮講，「我e5 心肝仔子，我beh離開lin2 lah，無論甚mih8人都留我be7 tiau5。明仔再beh有人將阿母he7 ti7 柴箱仔，扛出去，lin2若精神會chhoe7 無阿母。總是lin2 m7-thang siuN過頭煩惱，因為我beh去chhoe7 lin2阿爸，beh ka7伊講lin2攏已經真大漢lah。Lin2阿爸beh hou7日本人叫去出征e5 時，你chiah兩歲，lin2小弟仔iau2 ti7 腹肚底，今lin2攏teh讀冊lah。這中間m7是lin2阿母hou7 lin2大漢，是天頂e5上帝照顧lin2。今雖然阿母也beh離開lin2，總是天頂e5上帝無放sak lin2，beh hou7 lin2 ti7 地上成做一個有路用e5人。Kiam2-chhai2人beh chhoa7 lin2去別位，lin2著忍受，著聽人e5教示，等候阿母復活來chhoe7 lin2。主koh來e5日人攏beh 復活，lin2阿爸也teh等候hit日thang見著lin2。」

E7 ki3-tit a-bu2 beh li7-khui se3-kan e5 si5, kio3 goan2 lai5 bin5-chhng5-cheng5, khan goan2 e5 chhiu2, iong7 m7 bat thiaN-kiN3 e5 iu-bun7 e5 siaN tui3 goan2 kong2, “Goa2 e5 sim-koaN-a2-kiaN2, goa2 beh li7-khui lin2 lah, bo5 lun7 sim2-mih8 lang5 to lau5 goa2 be7 tiau5.  Bin5-a2-chai3 beh u7 lang5 chiong a-bu2 he7 ti7 chha5-siuN-a2, kng--chhut-khi3, lin2 na7 cheng-sin5 e7 chhoe7 bo5 a-bu2.  Chong2-si7 lin2 m7-thang siuN koe3-thau5 hoan5-lo2, in-ui7 goa2 beh khi3 chhoe7 lin2 a-pa, beh ka7 i kong2 lin2 long2 i2-keng chin toa7-han3 lah.  Lin2 a-pa beh hou7 Jit8-pun2 lang5 kio3 khi3 chhut-cheng e5 si5, li2 chiah nng7 hoe3, lin2 sio2-ti7-a2 iau2 ti7 pak-tou2-te2, taN lin2 long2 teh thak8-chheh lah.  Chit tiong-kan m7 si7 lin2 a-bu2 hou7 lin2 toa7-han3, si7 thiN-teng2 e5 Siong7-te3 chiau3-kou3 lin2.  TaN sui-jian5 a-bu2 ia7 beh li7-khui lin2, chong2-si7 thiN-teng2 e5 Siong7-te3 bo5 pang3-sak lin2, beh hou7 lin2 ti7 te7-chiuN7 chiaN5-cho3 chit8 e5 u7 lou7-eng7 e5 lang5.  Kiam2-chhai2 lang5 beh chhoa7 lin2 khi3 pat8-ui7, lin2 tioh8 jim2-siu7, tioh8 thiaN lang5 e5 ka3-si7, tan2-hau7 a-bu2 koh-oah8 lai5 chhoe7 lin2.  Chu2 koh lai5 e5 jit8 lang5 long2 beh koh-oah8, lin2 a-pa ia7 teh tan2-hau7 hit jit8 thang kiN3 tioh8 lin2.”
Hit 時我kan-ta知，beh有一個thang驚e5運命親像大kha布袋beh te2 阮兩個去遠遠e5所在。阿母因為無阿爸，勞苦著磨過頭，身軀帶病來離開世間。阮hit時攏m7知憨憨，只有知影阿母hou7人扛出去na7-tiaN7。

Hit si5 goa2 kan-ta chai, beh u7 chit8 e5 thang kiaN e5 un7-mia7 chhin-chhiuN7 toa7 kha pou3-te7 beh te2 goan2 nng7 e5 khi3 hng7-hng7 e5 sou2-chai7.  A-bu2 in-ui7 bo5 a-pa, lo5-khou2 tioh8-boa5 koe3-thau5, sin-khu tai3 peN7 lai5 li7-khui se3-kan.  Goan2 hit si5 long2 m7 chai gong7-gong7, chi2-u7 chai-iaN2 a-bu2 hou7 lang5 kng--chhut-khi3 na7-tiaN7.
阮來toa3阿姨e5厝e5頭一日，會記得阮兩人哭歸日，小弟仔問我講，「阿姊，chia是to2位neh？」我ma7 m7 知，kan-ta會曉講等候阿母復活，伊就會ka7 咱講。Tui3 hit時起，阮就be7 thang koh去讀冊。因為田庄無學校，beh讀冊ai3行真遠，koh著ai3錢。Ti7 chia也無禮拜堂，也無主日學，阮每日攏ti7田岸腳，趕鵝仔，飼羊meh仔na7-tiaN7。

Goan2 lai5 toa3 a-i5 e5 chhu3 e5 thau5-chit8 jit8, oe7 ki3-tit goan2 nng7 lang5 khau3 kui-jit8, sio2-ti7-a2 mng7 goa2 kong2, “A-che2, chia si7 to2-ui7 neh?”  Goa2 ma7 m7 chai, kan-ta oe7 hiau2 kong2 tan2-hau7 a-bu2 koh-oah8, i chiu7 e7 ka7 lan2 kong2.  Tui3 hit-si5 khi2, goan2 chiu7 be7 thang koh khi3 thak8-chheh.  In-ui7 chhan5-chng bo5 hak8-hau7, beh thak8-chheh ai3 kiaN5 chin hng7, koh tioh8 ai3 chiN5.  Ti7 chia ia7 bo5 le2-pai3-tng5, ia7 bo5 Chu2-jit8-oh8, goan2 mui2-jit8 long2 ti7 chhan5-hoaN7-kha, koaN2 go5-a2, chhi7 iuN5-meh-a2 na7-tiaN7.
來到這個無電火e5草地，ti7 暝時小弟仔時時ai3講驚暗，其實我ma7真驚，阮兩人teh睏e5 細細e5 房間，風透e5 時kiN3-koaihN叫，有時老鼠仔khi7-khok8叫。小弟仔半暝beh放尿，叫我kap伊去。我ti7暝時，時時ai3精神ka7小弟仔蓋被，才知早前阿母怎樣ti7 逐方面e5 疼心。

Lai5 kau3 chit e5 bo5 tian7-hoe2 e5 chhau2-te7, ti7 me5-si5 sio2-ti7-a2 si5-si5 ai3 kong2 kiaN am3, ki5-sit8 goa2 ma7 chin kiaN, goan2 nng7 lang5 teh khun3 e5 se3-se3 e5 pang5-keng, hong thau3 e5 si5 kiN3-koaihN-kio3, u7-si5 niau2-chhu2-a2 khi7-khok8-kio3.  Sio2-ti7-a2 poaN3-me5 beh pang3-jio7, kio3 goa2 kap i khi3.  Goa2 ti7 me5-si5, si5-si5 ai3 cheng-sin5 ka7 sio2-ti7-a2 kah-phoe7, chiah chai cha2-cheng5 a-bo2 chaiN2-iuN7 ti7 tak8 hong-bin7 e5 thiaN3-sim.
Ti7月光e5 暝時，kap濟濟囡仔ti7 埕nih teh thit-tho5 e5 時，阮be7 感覺甚mih8，到ti7 半暝，精神e5 時，看著窗仔光光，也有tou7-peh-a2 teh哮e5聲，我bat傷心續哮--出來，叫小弟仔精神，兩人相kap悽慘哮，m7 知ti7 時阮才會thang koh見著阿母。

Ti7 goeh8-kng e5 me5-si5, kap che7-che7 gin2-a2 ti7 tiaN5--nih teh thit-tho5 e5 si5, goan2 be7 kam2-kak sim2-mih8, kau3 ti7 poaN3-mi5, cheng-sin5 e5 si5, khoaN3 tioh8 thang-a2 kng-kng, ia7 u7 tou7-peh-a2 teh hau2 e5 siaN, goa2 bat siong-sim soa3 hau2--chhut-lai5, kio3 sio2-ti7-a2 cheng-sin5, nng7 lang5 saN-kap chhi-chham2 hau2, m7 chai ti7-si5 goan2 chiah e7 thang koh kiN3 tioh8 a-bu2.

有一日，阮趕鵝仔去真遠飼e5 時，ti7遠遠看著一間厝，厝頂有十字架，阮e5 歡喜be7顧tit。阮就趕緊去，阮兩個手牽手勻勻仔tui3 門入去，靜chauh-chauh e5禮拜堂，阮跪ti7 hit e5台前祈禱，hou7阮thang koh一擺kap阿母相見，攏無人攪擾阮。Tui3 hit日起，阮才bat笑。到每禮拜日阮攏趕鵝仔到chia，thang赴主日學，因為這個是阮所有細細e5希望。阮chhoe7 著禮拜堂那親像chhoe7著阿母teh toa3 e5所在e5路。阮若來chia，那親像較近阿母e5厝e5款。有時小弟仔ai3我講故事hou7伊聽，我be7 曉講甚mih8，kan-ta想起以前阿母講hou7我聽e5 na7-tiaN7。Ti7暗暗e5眠床，兩人蓋ti7被底，目珠kheh-kheh，我就講阿母所講e5 hou7小弟仔聽。雖然阮攏聽到熟熟，iau2-ku2 hit時是阮上燒lo7 e5 時。阮kheh相倚來相kap講，「有一日，兩個囡仔beh去chhoe7老父，in阿母提3項物hou7 in，…」Hit時那親像teh眠夢，阮就漸漸睏--去。

U7 chit8 jit8, goan2 koaN2 go5-a2 khi3 chin hng7 chhi7 e5 si5, ti7 hng7-hng7 khoaN3 tioh8 chit8 keng chhu3, chhu3-teng2 u7 sip8-ji7-ke3, goan2 e5 hoaN-hi2 be7-kou3-tit.  Goan2 chiu7 koaN2-kin2 khi3, goan2 nng7 e5 chhiu2 khan-chhiu2 un5-un5-a2 tui3 mng5 jip8--khi3, cheng7-chauh-chauh e5 le2-pai3-tng5, goan2 kui7 ti7 hit e5 tai5-cheng5 ki5-to2, hou7 goan2 thang koh chit8 pai2 kap a-bu2 saN-kiN3, long2 bo5 lang5 kiau2-jiau2 goan2.  Tui3 hit jit8 khi2, goan2 chiah bat chhio3.  Kau3 mui2 le2-pai3-jit8 goan2 long2 koaN2 go5-a2 kau3 chia, thang hu3 Chu2-jit8-oh8, in-ui7 chit e5 si7 goan2 sou2 u7 se3-se3 e5 hi-bang7.  Goan2 chhoe7 tioh8 le2-pai3-tng5 na2 chhin-chhiuN7 chhoe7 tioh8 a-bu2 teh toa3 e5 sou2-chai7 e5 lou7.  Goan2 na7 lai5 chia, na2 chhin-chhiuN7 khah kun7 a-bu2 e5 chhu3 e5 khoan2.  U7 si5 sio2-ti7-a2 ai3 goa2 kong2 kou3-su7 hou7 i thiaN, goa2 be7-hiau2 kong2 sim2-mih8, kan-ta siuN7-khi2 i2-cheng5 a-bu2 kong2 hou7 goa2 thiaN e5 na7-tiaN7.  Ti7 am3-am3 e5 bin5-chhng5, nng7 lang5 kah ti7 phoe7-te2, bak8-chiu kheh-kheh, goa2 chiu7 kong2 a-bu2 sou2 kong2 e5 hou7 sio2-ti7-a2 thiaN.  Sui-jian5 goan2 long2 thiaN kau3 sek8-sek8, iau2-ku2 hit si5 si7 goan2 siong7 sio-lo7 e5 si5.  Goan2 kheh sio-oa2 lai5 saN-kap kong2, “U7 chit8 jit8, nng7 e5 gin2-a2 beh khi3 chhoe7 lau7-pe7, in a-bu2 theh8 3 hang7 mih8 hou7 in, ...”  Hit si5 na2 chhin-chhiuN7 teh bin5-bang7, goan2 chiu7 chiam7-chiam7 khun3--khi3.
Koh無偌久母親節beh到，阮有種真濟翦絨 花，beh ti7 hit日提來。主日學，我插白花，將紅花送朋友。阮逐日teh算，那親像hit日beh見著阿母。

Koh bo5 joa7 ku2 Bo2-chhin cheh beh kau3, goan2 u7 cheng3 chin che7 chian2-jiong5 hoe, beh ti7 hit jit8 theh8 lai5.  Chu2-jit8-oh8, goa2 chhah peh8-hoe, chiong ang5-hoe sang3 peng5-iu2.  Goan2 tak8-jit8 teh sng3, na2 chhin-chhiuN7 hit jit8 beh kiN3 tioh8 a-bu2.
